701281f-a.text:
Home Street (right), north side, east from Intervale Avenue, showing the Holy Trinity Lutheran Church, at the N.E. corner of the aforementioned thoroughfares. On the left is the east side of Intervale Avenue, extending north to Fox Street.
April 26, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
701281f-a.folder: Home Street & Intervale Street, Bronx, NY
